  border: 0 !important;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0) !important;
  height: 1px !important;
  margin: -1px !important;
  overflow: hidden !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  position: absolute !important;
  width: 1px !important;
  white-space: nowrap !important;
  outline: 0 !important;
  -webkit-appearance: none !important;
  -moz-appearance: none !important;
  left: 0 !important;
}

         this is the date with the lowest available price</span><!----><!----><!----></span></span><!----><abc-ripple class="ng-star-inserted"><div class="abc-ripple-wrapper"></div></abc-ripple><!----></button><!----><!----><!----></abc-button></abc-tab-button><!----><div class="abc-selected-tab-indicator" style="width: 14.2857%; transform: translateX(500%);"></div></div></div><div class="abc-tab-button-focus-ring" style="--abc-focus-ring-offsetX-ratio: 3; --abc-focus-ring-width: 14.285714285714286%;"></div></div><abc-button class="abc-tab-navigation-button abc-button-wrapper ng-star-inserted"><button class="abc-button abc-button-height-default abc-button-theme-custom abc-button-type-default abc-dir-ltr user-select-none ng-star-inserted" id="abcButtonElement28" type="button" aria-disabled="false" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" data-analytics-track="bf&gt;search results" data-analytics-val="calendar panel&gt;date navigation&gt;right arrow"><span class="abc-button-content" id="abcButtonElement28Content"><span class="abc-button-text"><span class="ngx-ac-icon ngx-ac-icon-chevronRight ng-star-inserted" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 32 32" role="img">

			c0,1.3,0.4,2.3,1.2,3.1c0.8,0.7,1.9,1.1,3.3,1.1c1.3,0,2.7-0.3,4-0.8V15.1z"></path></g><path fill="#F9F9F9" d="M86.3,15.5l4.7-10.8h2.9l4.7,10.8h-2.9l-1.3-2.9h-5l-1.3,2.9H86.3z M90.1,11.2h3.7L92,6.9L90.1,11.2z"></path><path fill="#F9F9F9" d="M117.6,15.5l4.7-10.8h2.9l4.7,10.8h-2.9l-1.3-2.9h-5l-1.3,2.9H117.6z M121.3,11.2h3.7l-1.9-4.3L121.3,11.2z"></path><path fill="#F9F9F9" d="M152.8,6.9l1.9,4.3H151L152.8,6.9z M152,4.7l-4.7,10.8h1.8l1.3-2.9h5l1.3,2.9h2.9l-4.7-10.8H152z"></path><polygon fill="#F9F9F9" points="102.2,15.5 102.2,4.7 105.1,4.7 111.9,12.4 111.9,4.7 114,4.7 114,15.5 111.3,15.5 104.3,7.4

aria-controls="ot-desc-id-C0004"><h3 id="ot-header-id-C0004">Marketing Cookies</h3></div></li></ul></div><div class="ot-tab-desc ot-sdk-eight ot-sdk-columns"><div class="ot-desc-cntr" id="ot-tab-desc" tabindex="0" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="ot-pvcy-hdr"><h4 id="ot-pvcy-hdr">Your Privacy</h4><p id="ot-pc-desc" class="ot-grp-desc">We use cookies to make the website work, to personalize it, to analyze data and to present you with more relevant ads. Some of these cookies may be set by us or third-party providers. You have the choice to accept or reject all optional cookies on the pages of Aeroplan and Air Canada Vacations or manage your preferences below.<br><br>If you are a signed-in Aeroplan member, you have already consented to cookies through the <a href="https://www.aircanada.com/ca/en/aco/home/legal/privacy-policy.html#/" class="privacy-notice-link" target="_blank">Aeroplan Privacy Policy</a>.  Cookies help us maximize the value of your membership to you by letting us better understand your preferences and interests. You can manage your cookies through your browser.<br><br>To learn how to manage cookies through a browser and for other information, see our
            <br><a href="https://www.aircanada.com/ca/en/aco/home/legal/cookie-policy.html" class="privacy-notice-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank" aria-label="More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab">cookies and tracking technologies policy.</a></p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0001"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Strictly Necessary Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are necessary for the website to work properly. They handle tasks like setting cookie consent, signing in and filling out forms. While you can set your browser to block them, some website features won’t work if you do.</p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0002"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Performance Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0002" id="ot-group-id-C0002" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0002" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0002" style=""> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0002"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Performance Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies count visits to our website, analyze where they come from, and improve overall site performance. For instance, they help us assess the success of our campaigns, test new features, and see how users interact with our site.</p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0003"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Functional Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0003" id="ot-group-id-C0003" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0003" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0003" style=""> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0003"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Functional Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies help make our website work better and personalize your experience based on how you use it. For example, we may present you offers based on your browsing. </p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0004"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Marketing Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0004" id="ot-group-id-C0004" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0004" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0004" style=""> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0004"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Marketing Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are set by advertising partners to help build a profile of your interests, which they then use to show you relevant ads on other websites. For example, you may see an ad for a travel destination on social media based on your flight search on our website.</p></div></div></div></div><!-- Vendors / Hosts --><section id="ot-pc-lst" class="ot-hide ot-pc-scrollbar ot-enbl-chr"><div class="ot-lst-cntr ot-pc-scrollbar"><div id="ot-pc-hdr"><div id="ot-lst-title"><button class="ot-link-btn back-btn-handler" aria-label="Back"><svg id="ot-back-arw" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 444.531 444.531" xml:space="preserve"><title>Back Button</title><g><path fill="#656565" d="M213.13,222.409L351.88,83.653c7.05-7.043,10.567-15.657,10.567-25.841c0-10.183-3.518-18.793-10.567-25.835
